english: swallow bird; swallow (the bird); to smile; to chant

etymology.interpretation: The character 燕 depicts a swallow, a type of bird known for its agile flight and distinctive shape. It intuitively represents the bodily form of the swallow with minimal stylization.

examples.chinese: 我看见一只燕子飞过了天际(我看到一隻燕子飛過了天際)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ kànjiàn yī zhī yànzi fēiguòle tiānjì。(I saw a swallow flying across the sky.)

examples.chinese: 燕子在春天(燕子在春天)。
examples.pinyin: Yànzi zài chūntiān。(Swallows are present in spring.)
